sentences: Paul Towndrow (born 13 December 1978) is a Scottish saxophonist, composer, arranger and educator.
He won the Audience Prize at The 2003 World Saxophone Competition and is a member of Scotlandâ€™s flagship jazz orchestra, the Scotland National Jazz Orchestra.
His 2009 album, Newology, attracted a four star review in The Guardian.
Paul Towndrow & Steve Hamilton Duo: We Shine The Sun - 2016 Keywork Records
